metadata.name: Super Smash Bros Soundtrack [Rep. Ver.]
metadata.description:
â€¢ Repentance only (the original version can be found [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2551214017]here[/url], for AB+ players and people who preferred the original tracklist)
This is a carefully-curated pack featuring music from the Super Smash Bros. series. Most of it consists of Smash originals (e.g. Final Destination, Multi-Man Melee), but there are several official remixes as well (e.g. Brinstar Depths, Great Temple). A full track list can be found below, or as a spreadsheet [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-6i1juoNblVoJ6VdiPkW-RBTrcEWS9OB58RIciNiZnk/edit#gid=1893903508]here[/url].
All of the music in this pack loops as it should. I tried to get a good variety of songs from all five games, though there ended up being a lot of Brawl music and not much SSB4.
This mod requires the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1933285222]Soundtrack Menu[/url].
Also, it's recommended (but optional) that you download the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2489123309]Isaac's Parents Don't Fight mod[/url], which removes the Ascent voice clips (they just don't fit well with the new music).
Track List: Basement - Step: The Plain - Brawl Cellar - Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda - Brawl Burning Basement - Brinstar (SSE Version) - Brawl Caves - With Mila's Divine Protection - Brawl Catacombs - Opening/Menu - Metroid Prime (SSE Version) - Brawl Flooded Caves - Stickerbush Symphony - Brawl Depths - Underground Theme (Super Mario Land) - Brawl Necropolis - Castle / Boss Fortress (SMW / SMB3) - Brawl Dank Depths - Step: The Cave - Brawl Womb - Brinstar Depths (Melee) - Melee Scarred Womb - Brinstar Depths (Ultimate) - Ultimate Blue Womb - The Dark Realm - Ultimate Sheol - Step: Subspace - Brawl Cathedral - Destroyed Skyworld - 3DS/Wii U Dark Room - Theme of Solid Snake - Ultimate Chest - Great Temple - Brawl Void - We're Robots (Dr. Wily Stage 2) - Ultimate Boss Splash Screen - Challenger Appears - 64 Boss (Normal) - Boss Battle - Brawl Boss (Mom) - Multi-Man Melee 1 - Melee Boss (Mom's Heart) - Final Destination Ver. 2 - 3DS/Wii U Boss (Satan) - Final Destination (Melee) - Melee Boss (Isaac) - 02 Battle - Brawl Boss (The Lamb) - Master Core - 3DS/Wii U Boss (???) - Galeem - Ultimate Defeated Boss - Stage Clear 1 - Melee Boss (alternate) - Boss Battle Song 1 - Brawl Defeated Boss (alternate) - Stage Clear 2 - Melee Boss (Hush) - Dharkon - Ultimate Defeated Hush - Classic - Results Screen - Brawl Boss (Mega Satan) - Giga Bowser - Melee Boss (Ultra Greed) - Fire Field - Brawl Boss (Delirium) - Multi-Man Melee 2 - Melee Empty Boss Room - Main Theme Piano Solo - Ultimate Challenge Room Fight - Metal Battle - Melee Challenge Room Completed - Bonus Game: Clear - 64 Secret Room - Character Introduction Screen - 64 Devil Room - Save Point - Brawl Angel Room - All Star Rest Area (Melee) - Melee Shop - Shop - Ultimate Library - Sticker Album / Album / Chronicle - Brawl Arcade Room - Trophies - Melee Utero - Norfair - Brawl Downpour - Route 10 - 3DS/Wii U Dross - Underground Theme (Super Mario Bros.) - Brawl Mines - Theme of Tara - Brawl Ashpit - Hidden Mountain and Forest - Brawl Mausoleum - N's Castle Medley - 3DS/Wii U Gehenna - Cross Your Heart - Ultimate Corpse - Step: Subspace Ver. 3 - Brawl Home - All Clear - 64 Abandoned Mineshaft - Save Point - Brawl Mineshaft Escape - Vs. Parasite Queen - Ultimate Planetarium - All Star Rest Area (Brawl) - Brawl Secret Room Alt - Menu - 64 Secret Room Alt Alt - Classic Mode Mural - Ultimate Boss Rush - Duel Zone - 64 Boss Rush (jingle) - Unused Fanfare - 64 Mom's Shadow Intro - Challenger Approaching - Melee Echoes Reverse - All Clear [Reversed] - 64 Boss (alternate alternate) - Metal Battle - Melee Boss (Mother) - MEGALOVANIA - Ultimate Dogma Intro - Single Player Stage Intro (Final Stage) - 64 Boss (Dogma) - Final Destination (64) - 64 Boss (Beast) - Galeem / Dharkon - Ultimate Boss Death Alternate Alternate (jingle) - Stage Clear - 64 Downpour (reversed) - Route 10 [Reversed] - 3DS/Wii U Dross (reversed) - Underground Theme (Super Mario Bros.) [Reversed] - Brawl Genesis (reversed) - How to Play - Super Smash Bros. Melee - Ultimate Game Over (jingle) - Game Over - Brawl Game Over - Classic Mode Defeat - Ultimate
